docs.snippet: David Wright signed up to be the bridge to the next winning Mets team. The Mets have staggered through five losing seasons in a row, threatening to waste the prime years of their best player....
docs.lead_paragraph: David Wright signed up to be the bridge to the next winning Mets team. The Mets have staggered through five losing seasons in a row, threatening to waste the prime years of their best player.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that New York Mets third baseman David Wright is among game's best, but has been playing for losing team; Wright, under contract with the team through 2020, has already been in New York City longer than almost any other active Met or Yankee except for Derek Jeter.

headline.main: Mets’ Wright Waits for His Team to Catch Up
headline.print_headline: Mets’ Wright Waits for His Team to Catch Up

docs.snippet: Yangervis Solarte isn’t a name that stands out in the crowd of players competing for a Yankees infield job, but the numbers he has put up this spring demand attention....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yangervis Solarte isn’t a name that stands out in the crowd of players competing for a Yankees infield job, but the numbers he has put up this spring demand attention.
docs.abstract: New York Yankees switch-hitter Yangervis Solarte shows promising statistics in early part of spring training but has yet to be assigned a position; other baseball news noted.

headline.main: Top Yankee Hitter So Far? He’s Fighting for a Job
headline.print_headline: Top Yankee Hitter So Far? He’s Fighting for a Job

docs.snippet: Dan Warthen, the Mets’ pitching coach, apologized for using a racial slur in the team’s spring training clubhouse....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dan Warthen, the Mets’ pitching coach, apologized for using a racial slur in the team’s spring training clubhouse.
docs.abstract: New York Mets pitching coach Dan Warthen and general manager Sandy Alderson both apologize for Warthen's use of racial slur in spring training clubhouse.

headline.main: Mets’ Pitching Coach Apologizes for a Slur
headline.print_headline: Mets’ Pitching Coach Apologizes for a Slur

docs.snippet: The United States Mint will begin selling special curved coins this month to honor the National Baseball Hall of Fame, with a design representing the inverse images of a ball and mitt, U.S. Mint officials said on Thursday....

docs.snippet: A building maintenance man who pulled a handgun and shot two teenagers to death as they beat him with a baseball bat, is being held while prosecutors determine whether he should face charges, Milwaukee police said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A building maintenance man who pulled a handgun and shot two teenagers to death as they beat him with a baseball bat, is being held while prosecutors determine whether he should face charges, Milwaukee police said on Thursday.

docs.snippet: Liberty Media, the company controlled by John C. Malone, announced late Thursday that it had abandoned its plan to buy the shares of SiriusXM that it did not already own as part of a move to set up two tracking stocks to house the company’s asse...
docs.abstract: Liberty Media, the company controlled by John C. Malone, announced late Thursday that it had abandoned its plan to buy the shares of SiriusXM that it did not already own as part of a move to set up two tracking stocks to house the company’s assets.

headline.main: Liberty Abandons Plan to Buy Rest of Sirius

docs.snippet: Prosecutors on Thursday displayed photos of the inside of Oscar Pistorius' home at his murder trial, showing a court some images of the bloody scene where the double-amputee track star killed girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp by shooting her through a to...
docs.lead_paragraph: Prosecutors on Thursday displayed photos of the inside of Oscar Pistorius' home at his murder trial, showing a court some images of the bloody scene where the double-amputee track star killed girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp by shooting her through a toilet door. Here's a description of the things a former police officer says he found when he responded to the shooting in the early hours of Feb. 14 last year.

headline.main: Bloodstains on Walls in Pistorius' Home
headline.print_headline: Bloodstains on Walls in Pistorius' Home
